text: [Music]
my top five brain friendly foods are
salmon avocado eggs nuts and seeds and
coconut oil and olive oil although your
brain only weighs two to three kilos so
it's a tiny percentage of your body
weight it sucks up 20 to 30 percent of
the breakdown products of a healthy
balanced diet so glucose is a resource
for the brain it takes seven to eight
hours for our brain to clean itself
overnight and that's why sleep is so
important to the brain if you have any
sleep disturbance overnight you can be
operating with an IQ loss of five to
eight points the next day the general
advice is to drink half a liter of water
for every 15 kilos of your body weight
per day for the average male leader this
would be approximately three liters of
water per day just doing 10 deep breaths
before a high-stakes meeting can really
send some extra resources to your brain
ideally you would move around all day
doing an average of 10,000 steps the
scientific evidence shows that 12
minutes of meditation per day reduces
your stress hormone levels allowing more
of a pause button between emotional
instinctive reactions and how you choose
to behave and think in the workplace
